clubpulse.title: ClubPulse - Multi-Tenant Sports Management
clubpulse.description: Complete microservices ecosystem for sports club management with event-driven architecture. 11 independent Go microservices with React TypeScript frontend, dual database mode optimized for Railway, WebSocket for real-time, distributed Redis cache, Prometheus + Grafana for observability, and complete notification system.
features: 11 independent Go microservices (Auth, User, Calendar, Championship, Membership, Facilities, Notification, Payments, Booking, Super-Admin, BFF)
Event-driven architecture with inter-service communication
Dual database mode: single DB for production (78% cost savings) or multi-DB for development
React TypeScript frontend with scalable modular architecture
WebSocket for real-time communication between clients
Redis for distributed cache and session management
Circuit breakers for resilience to service failures
Complete notification system with SendGrid (Email, SMS)
Payment gateway integration (Stripe, Mercado Pago)
API Gateway (BFF) with rate limiting and centralized authentication
achievements: Architecture optimized for Railway with 78% cost savings vs multi-DB
End-to-end testing suite with real services (no mocks)
Custom Grafana dashboards for each microservice
Centralized logging system with complete observability
